00030 using namespace std;
00031 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00032 
00033 const std::string TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE = "../data/test.file.data_dat";
00034 
00035 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataGroupTest_FStream );
00036 
00037 DataGroupTest_FStream::DataGroupTest_FStream()
00038 {
00039         data = 0;
00040         dc = 0;
00041 }
00042 
00043 DataGroupTest_FStream::~DataGroupTest_FStream()
00044 {
00045 
00046 }
00047 
00048 void DataGroupTest_FStream::setUp()
00049 {
00050         data = new GenericData;
00051         GenericFileReader reader;
00052         reader.SetFilename(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE);
00053         reader.ReadHeader(*data);
00054         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00055         data->Header().GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd);
00056 
00057         ifs.open(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00058         dc = new DataGroup(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE, *dchBegin, ifs);
00059 }
00060 
00061 void DataGroupTest_FStream::tearDown()
00062 {
00063         ifs.close();
00064         delete data;
00065         delete dc;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void DataGroupTest_FStream::CreationTest()
00069 {
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dc != 0);
00071 }
00072 
00073 void DataGroupTest_FStream::HeaderTest()
00074 {
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dc->Header().GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00076 }
00077 
00078 void DataGroupTest_FStream::DataSetByIndexTest()
00079 {
00080         DataSet* dataPlane = dc->DataSet(0);
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00082 
00083         // Check the DataSet data
00084         dataPlane->Open();
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->BytesPerRow() == 2);
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Rows() == 100);
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Cols() == 1);
00088 
00089         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00090         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00091         {
00092                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00093                 u_int16_t value;
00094                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00095                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00096         }
00097 
00098         dataPlane->Close();     // optional - Delete will call this
00099         dataPlane->Delete();
00100 }
00101 
00102 void DataGroupTest_FStream::DataSetByNameTest()
00103 {
00104         DataSet* dataPlane = dc->DataSet(L"acquired data");
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00106 
00107         // Check the DataSet data
00108         dataPlane->Open();
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->BytesPerRow() == 2);
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Rows() == 100);
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Cols() == 1);
00112 
00113         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00114         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00115         {
00116                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00117                 u_int16_t value;
00118                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00119                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00120         }
00121 
00122         dataPlane->Close();     // optional - Delete will call this
00123         dataPlane->Delete();
00124 }
